testimonials.name: Ahmed Raza
testimonials.text: The Aga Khan Board curriculum and computer lab facilities gave me a solid foundation for my computer science degree. The teachers were incredibly supportive.

testimonials.name: Sana Khan
testimonials.text: Excellent science faculty and lab facilities prepared me well for medical entrance exams. The biology and chemistry teachers were exceptional.

testimonials.name: Bilal Siddiqui
testimonials.text: The business studies program and career counseling helped me secure admission in IBA. The mock interviews were particularly helpful.

testimonials.name: Ayesha Malik
testimonials.text: The art and design facilities along with excellent physics teaching helped me pursue architecture. Still grateful for the foundation I received.

testimonials.name: Usman Ali
testimonials.text: The mathematics and physics faculty were outstanding. Their teaching methods made complex concepts easy to understand for engineering entrance.

testimonials.name: Fatima Hassan
testimonials.text: The commerce program was excellent. The accounting teachers provided real-world insights that helped me in my CA journey.

testimonials.name: Omar Farooq
testimonials.text: Computer lab facilities and programming basics taught in school gave me an edge in university. The IT faculty was ahead of its time.

testimonials.name: Zainab Shah
testimonials.current: Law Student at University of London
testimonials.text: The debating society and English language skills developed here were crucial for my law career. Excellent communication skills training.
